00021 #include "FusionCHPData.h"
00022 #include "GenericFileReader.h"
00023 #include "FileUtils.h"

00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 
00030 FusionCHPDataReg *FusionCHPDataReg::m_Head = NULL;
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Store the ids
00034  */
00035 void FusionCHPDataReg::SetFileTypeIds(const AffymetrixGuidTypeList &fileTypeIds)
00036 {
00037         fileTypeIdentifiers = fileTypeIds;
00038 }
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Set the members. The head is the pointer to this class.
00042  */
00043 FusionCHPDataReg::FusionCHPDataReg() : m_Next(m_Head)
00044 {
00045         m_Head = this;
00046 }
00047 
00048 FusionCHPDataReg::~FusionCHPDataReg()
00049 {
00050         fileTypeIdentifiers.clear();
00051 }
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Read the header and return the file type id. If the file fails to read
00055  * it must be an old CHP file, just return a blank for the file type id.
00056  */
00057 FusionCHPData *FusionCHPDataReg::CreateObject(const AffymetrixGuidType &id)
00058 {
00059         // Find the matching CHP data object.
00060         for (FusionCHPDataReg *p=m_Head; p != NULL; p = p->m_Next)
00061         {
00062                 AffymetrixGuidTypeList::iterator it;
00063                 for (it=p->fileTypeIdentifiers.begin(); it!=p->fileTypeIdentifiers.end(); ++it)
00064                 {
00065                         if (*it == id)
00066                         {
00067                                 FusionCHPData *chp = p->MakeObject();
00068                                 chp->fileTypeIdentifiers = p->fileTypeIdentifiers;
00069                                 chp->fileTypeIdentifier = id;
00070                                 if (chp)
00071                                 {
00072                                         return chp;
00073                                 }
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         // Go back now and find the generic reader (the one with no file type identifiers)
00079         for (FusionCHPDataReg *p=m_Head; p != NULL; p = p->m_Next)
00080         {
00081                 if (p->fileTypeIdentifiers.size() == 0)
00082                 {
00083                         FusionCHPData *chp = p->MakeObject();
00084                         chp->fileTypeIdentifier = id;
00085                         return chp;
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 
00089         return NULL;
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*
00093  * Read the guid from the file.
00094  */
00095 bool ReadGuidFromFile(const std::string &fileName, AffymetrixGuidType &guid)
00096 {
00097         if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName.c_str()) == false)
00098                 return false;
00099 
00100         GenericData data;
00101         GenericFileReader reader;
00102         try
00103         {
00104                 reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00105                 reader.ReadHeader(data);
00106                 guid = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId();
00107                 return true;
00108         }
00109         catch (...)
00110         {
00111                 guid = "";
00112                 return true;
00113         }
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*
00117  * Read the file type ID from the header of the file.
00118  * Now find the data object with the matching id.
00119  * Read the file and return the pointer.
00120  */
00121 FusionCHPData *FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(const std::string &fileName)
00122 {
00123         AffymetrixGuidType fileTypeId;
00124         if (ReadGuidFromFile(fileName, fileTypeId) == false)
00125                 return NULL;
00126 
00127         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::CreateObject(fileTypeId);
00128         if (chp)
00129         {
00130                 chp->SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00131                 if (chp->ReadHeader() == false)
00132                 {
00133                         delete chp;
00134                         chp = NULL;
00135                 }
00136         }
00137         return chp;
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*
00141  * Read the file type ID from the header of the file.
00142  * Now find the data object with the matching id.
00143  * Read the file and return the pointer.
00144  */
00145 FusionCHPData *FusionCHPDataReg::Read(const std::string &fileName)
00146 {
00147         AffymetrixGuidType fileTypeId;
00148         if (ReadGuidFromFile(fileName, fileTypeId) == false)
00149                 return NULL;
00150         FusionCHPData *chp = CreateObject(fileTypeId);
00151         if (chp)
00152         {
00153                 chp->SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00154                 if (chp->Read() == false)
00155                 {
00156                         delete chp;
00157                         chp = NULL;
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         return chp;
00161 }
